Although, we do not allow pets at our property, we do embrace service pets as well as their owners and do our best to ensure a comfortable stay. We thank you for stay and your feedback and wish you safe travels.   Thank you,   Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Affordable alternative to Disney area hotels
Summary: This hotel is an alternative for an inexpensive hotel to Disneyland. The hotel is about 12 miles away but we got a great rate. It is in a complex with restaurants and stores. Room was clean and the complimentary breakfast has extensive choices including eggs, sausage and waffles. With parking, this makes a theme park trip affordable.
Manager Response: Hi DTravelDiva,   Thank you so much for your recent stay to the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills!  Sounds like you provide helpful trips to travelers and we appreciate that you took the time to share those.  We are pleased cyou enjoyed our location as well as our breakfast and hope to have the joy of welcoming you back soon!  Thank you! Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Our stay here was Excellent, Great Staff, easy check-in, rooms were nice, Breakfast was added Bonus, I highly recommend. It was close to Disneyland but not TOO close, Bed was Comfy,parking was a Little tight, if your a Marriot Rewards member you get special parking spots which was nice, I will be back.
Manager Response: Hi lilyalcaraz1,   Thank you!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills and for sharing your experience.  We love that you enjoyed our distance to Disneyland, our staff, as well as our breakfast. We are so pleased that you've noticed our newly installed Marriott Rewards Elite Member parking.  We definitely appreciate you and hope that we will have the opportunity to welcome you back.   Thank you!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: I went with my wife and 7 years old son for 16 Nights to Los Angeles for the first time ever. Expectations were high and the Fair Field Inn help us to make it as enjoyable as possible. Hotel staff is super friendly and always willing to help. Breakfast was good and with good selection (eggs, sausages, fruits, cereal and so on) however, over the course of the 16th nights, we also went to other places just to change the routine. Bed was confortable, rooms were nicely decorated and looks modern. Bathroom was spacious. cleaning was done every day. We were most of the time out of the room getting to know all the places we wanted to visit however the time we spent in the hotel, in the Night and in the morning was pleasant and we can't complain. Definetely we wil come back. Also the
Manager Response: Hi Franny L.,   Thank you so much for choosing the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills as the location to have your family stay during your recent vacation.  We are so happy that you chose us and that you enjoyed your stay with us from our rooms, to our breakfast and our super friendly staff.  We would love to welcome you back to our hotel again as I am sure there is much more to explore!  Thank you,   Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: If you understand that Fairfield Inns are the low end of the Marriott properties then you will not be disappointed in this hotel. It is conveniently located off the freeway which plenty of dining opportunities within walking distance. The room is adequately appointed and has the typical Marriott bed. The pool and fitness room are decent. A good nights sleep can be had.
Manager Response: Hi John,   Thank you so much for your recent stay at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills.  We pleased you enjoyed your stay from our rooms to our pool and fitness roomand hope that the next time your travels bring you to this area you will stay with us again.   Happy travels!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We've stayed here before and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.  So when we booked another Disney Vacation, the Hotel was a no-brainer. The staff was attentive and friendly.  The property as well as guest rooms were well maintained, Great value, comfortable stay and a well stocked, tasty breakfast. Plenty of groceries stores and restaurant nearby.  Looking forward to our 2nd stay soon. Thank you, Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills
Manager Response: Hi LVLAMBO,   Thank you so much for your continued loyalty!  We are so pleased we were able to welcome you back on your recent Disney trip and once again you enjoyed your stay at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills. Come back and see us soon!  Thank you!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: High Maintenance me in a hotel like this.
Summary: Let me just start off by saying - I can be somewhat high maintenance when it comes to hotels.  No, let me correct that, I AM high maintenance when it comes to hotels. Needless to say, I tend to stay at hotels that are 3.5 stars or higher and even the 3.5 starred hotels tend to be questionable to me.  With that being said, I had to stay at this hotel for a wedding.  I was scared sh**less, often giving myself pep talks saying, "I can do this. I can do this."    I even explained this to the front desk staff in which they responded with a sympathetic giggle and asked if I could see the room prior to me checking in, in order to black-light it and to see if I could find anything unusual or disgusting that might deter me from staying there.  The walls were paper thin and it definitely
Manager Response: Hi Critic S.,   Thank you so much for your recent stay while you attended a wedding.  We are pleased to see that you had an enjoyable stay at our hotel and we were able to correct the issue promptly and to your satisfaction.  We appreciate having you and should you attend another wedding or if your travels bring you to the area we hope that we will be able to welcome you back.   Thank you!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Excellent low cost option for Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights and for the price paid this really was an excellent option. Its located right by a freeway so easy to access but the noise was not an issue. Its also very convenient to be right next to a small shopping area. Rooms were decent, and the free breakfast and Wi-Fi are as you would expect at this brand of Marriott. The pool exceeded expectations.   It is a reasonable drive from LAX but convenient for Disney, Angels stadium, Newport Beach etc. and lets face it, you have to drive to get anywhere in the LA area. Overall a great option for visiting LA.
Manager Response: Hi Jawsie1,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us here at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills.  It appears you had a great and fun-filled trip to the area and we so pleased that we were a part of it.  We are glad you enjoyed our rooms, pool, and breakfast.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to California!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Very clean and updated hotel. I stayed in a suite and it was huge! There was a bathtub, shower, sauna, living room, kitchen area, and bedroom.   The hotel is located next to a nice shopping center that has a grocery store and many food options.   If in the area again I will definitely stay here!
Manager Response: Hi Ali S.,   Thank you!  We appreciate hearing your feedback on your recent stay in our one bedroom king suite at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills.  Glad you enjoyed our location and proximity to various eateries and conveniences.  We hope your travels bring you back to the area soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Room was very clean and quiet. It came with a mini fridge and a microwave. Free wifi is included. Front desk was polite and helpful. It's adjacent to the 91 freeway, however you could not here any freeway noise. A great value for the area. I would definitely stay here again without hesitation!
Manager Response: Hi Gary L.,   Thank you so much for your recent visit to the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills!  We are delighted you enjoyed the microwave and mini refrigerator that are in all of our rooms as well as helpful front desk team.  We appreciate having you and can not wait to welcome you back!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: This hotel is great! The rooms & property are clean, staff is friendly and beds are very comfy. The breakfast is good with waffels,eggs,sausage,fruit and cereals. Staff kept food area clean and I loved that they kept the food stocked all the way thru posted end time. The place is a little far from LAX but close enough to Disney that you don't have to fight all that Disney hotel crowds. Only bad thing is its close to a freeway but noise wasn't bad even though our room faced it..Good thing is that freeway leads to every other freeway to go anywhere! I will definetly stay there again on our next trip to Cali.
Manager Response: Hi Holmes66,   We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us here at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills while on your recent Disney vacation.  Thank you for choosing us and for sharing your experience.  Location, breakfast, friendly staff, clean rooms are important to our guests and important to us.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to California!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: This hotel was very clean and comfortable. Quiet location in Anaheim Hills. Friendly staff and very good service. Very comfortable bed and spacious room. Continental breakfast was not very good otherwise a good hotel for the money.
Manager Response: Hi Coach1914,   It is always great to see someone enjoyed their stay here at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills!  We are pleased that you enjoyed our rooms as well as our friendly staff.  Thank you for staying with us as well as sharing your feedback.  We hope to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.  Thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: I wouldn't spend time and energy going there except if you have to be in that area for business meeting near by or a social event close by. Otherwise find yourself a closer hotel to the main attractions of Anaheim . Their rooms are Ok, clean and spacious, comfy Beds and good service out of the front desk you can check in and out pretty Fast. Did not try their breakfast as I had to leave early morning hours.
Manager Response: Hi Jchatila,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us.  We are pleased that you enjoyed the rooms and our front desk staff.  We appreciate your feedback!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Good hotel and about 20 minutes to disneyland
Summary: Stayed for 5 days for a trip to Disneyland with two little kids. Hotel  room was decent, but had issues. Closet doors were falling off the track, bathroom door creaked loudly when opened, main door lock would not work properly and had to try several times to get out card to work.   Pool was good and the hot tub was nice. Staff was great until we had a problem with our car. Dead battery was discovered one morning so I asked the desk clerk if they could use the shuttle van parked out front to jump start my car and I would go get a battery. He said they could not do it because of policy issues. Needless to say the kids that were already loaded in the car and we're hoping to have their "magical morning" was not magical and my 18 years as a Ford mechanic must mean I am not qualified
Manager Response: Hi Daspopo,   Thank you so much for your recent stay and for taking the time to share your experience in regards to your recent stay.  We understand that there were some issues that were encountered and would like to hear more about them so that we can correct the issues.     Thank you again,   Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean room was cleaned every day and the staff were so helpful and friendly.For us smokers the smoking area is very open.The coffee all day in the lobby was a saving grace. There is also a shopping centre 1 minute walk away
Manager Response: Hi Cindy R.,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us and for traveling such a long way!  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay here at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills and found our staff to be helpful and friendly.  We hope that we will have the honor of welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.   Thank you,   Nicole Reid Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Good for the price. Check in and out were very quick and easy. This is an outside entry door type hotel, but was in a safe and very convenient area. It was located just inside of a great little shopping plaza and close by to several others giving you a large selection of places to eat. The hot breakfast was good enough to get your day started.  Our room was very adequate, comfortable, and not too crowded, however, there was a slight musty odor. It seemed like the carpets may have been cleaned, but not completely aired out to dry properly. The smell was not overwhelming and goes away after you've been in the room for a few and let the AC run a little. Otherwise, the room and bathroom were updated and very clean. The onsite laundry facility was convenient, but very small for a
Manager Response: Hi Dave677,   Thank you so much for choosing the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills for your recent stay.  We are so pleased to see that overall you enjoyed your stay with us including our breakfast and the decor of our rooms.  We appreciate your feedback and hope we will be able to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.   Thank you!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: After a 5 year hiatus, we had occasion to stay at this hotel again. Imagine our surprise to find the interior of our room totally remodeled! We really liked the up-dated décor, especially the bathroom, where we saw a really cool use of space with rich looking wood and granite. The bed is always comfortable. We were there for a wedding and I didn't wake up in time for breakfast, but my husband said they had a full complement of typical Marriott breakfast items. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. The location is FANTASTIC! You can walk to a close-by local mall where there are restaurants, shops and a LA Fitness gym. One of my favorite places is  Corner Bakery, which is within the mall, as well as, a Starbucks.
Manager Response: Dear Shayna922,   Thank you so much for returning!  We are so pleased to see you like our latest rooms as well as our staff.  I see that you provided fellow travelers some useful tips as well such as parking and the shopping center.  Hopefully we will have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.   Thank you!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We stayed for two nights - over a weekend to visit with friends that live in Anaheim and go to the beach.  Our room was located on the second story and was directly over the large on site laundry facility.  This caused 2 problems: (1) When we opened the door to our room it smelled like musty dryer vent and (2) when the cleaning staff was doing laundry at night, I could feel the vibration of the washer shaking our bed.  I can get past the vibration given that it was intermittent.  However, the smell was bad.  I mean, prop the door open and sleep with the air on the lowest setting all night to ensure maximum airflow, bad.  The room was clean and looked updated.  The breakfast was also very good, if you were able to find a seat (the breakfast room is pretty small).  We ate around
Manager Response: Dear Allicia2014,   Thank you so much for your recent stay and for sharing your feedback with us.  We are pleased to see tha overall you had a decent stay although there are some things that could have made it better.  We do understand breakfast can be busy especially during that last hour.  We do hope that you will consider staying with us again .  Thank you!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: I was surprised at how nice the place was.
Summary: Maybe this property once was some other type of hotel- it has exterior doors. So at first I thought maybe this place is really old, but I was surprised the room I was in was completely remodeled. It was nice. The staff was friendly at check in and at the breakfast room. We were heading to Disneyland the next day and it took us about 15 minutes to get there and there was even some traffic.
Manager Response: Hi Explorer1421,   We are so thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for choosing us and for sharing your experience. We are pleased you enjoyed your room as well as our staff.  We hope that we are your hotel of choice on your next trip to Disney. Thanks again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: My key did not work for the room.  I went to front desk, they swiped key card and I tried again.  The key did not work again!  I went to the front desk and they said they would call maintenance to go to the room with me.  I travel frequently and know how room cards work!    I asked them for another room as I did not want to wait for their maintenance man to figure out the problem.  The key worked for the new room.  At 10:30 PM, I received a call from front desk asking for my last name.  At 10:45 PM, I received a call asking for my first and last name.  It is clear that the staff has no cares about the comfort of their guests and that someone might be sleeping at night.  Throughout my stay, I saw the maid service carts continuo0usly stored outside.  I decided that if this is
Manager Response: Hi Dave S.   First, let me say thank you for sharing your feedback with us.  We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us and what you experienced is atypical of the service we provide.  We want all of our guests to enjoy their stay from the moment they walk in.  I will have to look into why someone would be calling your room to get your information considering since you are our guest we already have that information.  Again I am truly sorry about your stay.   Thank you,  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We stay here frequently when coming to visit family locally, the beds are super comfy rooms are nice and clean. What set's them apart is how kind and helpful the staff here always is. Just one of many examples during our visit my young granddaughter fell ill I was stuck at hotel no car with a sick kiddo, Yolanda the breakfast lady was so wonderful she made a nice little plate of easily digestible items and gave some tips on where to go for help close by, Mother's Market was great!! We appreciate feeling like guests. As a bonus it is worth mentioning that parking is also free that is rare anymore.Thank you!
Manager Response: Hi TKSPO,   First, we would like to say thank you.  Thank you not only for staying with us but for also sharing your experience with us as well as fellow TripAdvisor users. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and continue to stay with us when visiting family.  Yolanda is a great asset on our team and we are so pleased that she was able to assist you!  Parking is complimentary and we do have our outdoor pool.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to visit family.   Thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: **Fair warning** the staff did a great job and did a huge service for me. Left my cell in a cab that they had arranged for me. Cabbie returned to hotel and they helped get it back to me in 24 hours. So I appreciate all their efforts.  So I am a fan of the staff. The hotel itself was a little dated but had very comfortable beds and reasonable amenities for the price. I required some specific things for a quick turn around stay and they were great.   My issue with this property is physical. You enter your room from the outside. It feels like a motel. With some dated furnishings and musty smells-I would most likely pick a sister property in the area next time. Residence Inn is 10 mins down the road and is much more comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Rcarlson1968,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us.  We are so pleased we were able to assist in getting your phone back to you as we understand how important it is to stay connected.  we are also glad you enjoyed our beds.  We are an exterior corridor hotel and we actually completed a full renovation in 2013.  Thank you again for your stay and your feedback and we do hope we can welcome you back soon!  Nicole  Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Marriott property that is not up to par
Summary: Recently stayed here while on Disney trip with our son and his family.  On the plus side, 20 minutes away from Disneyland and good rates to make affordable for a family trip.  Has a breakfast buffet available, nice pool, lots of on-site parking.  Close to several decent area restaurants.  Right next to Calif. 91.  Ramp is right around the corner.  Tip:  use Google maps or some equivalent GPS to avoid freeway traffic jams.  There are several routes to Disneyland and because the Fairfield Inn is located close to a couple of freeway interchanges it can get quite congested.  Negative:  I am a Marriott VC owner and along with staying at Vacation Clubs in many locations have stayed at numerous Marriott properties over the years from JW Marriott to Fairfield Inns.  No matter the brand,
Manager Response: Hi CaptainNalga,   Thank you so much for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience with us and in such great detail.  We take your concerns seriously and will be addressing each department.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future so you can truly see just how awesome we can be  and why so many guests do enjoy staying with us.  Once again thank you!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Free internet, free breakfast and free parking were great but the super soft bed will keep me from returning. I was told that all the rooms have plush mattresses so if firm is your mattress of choice, don't bother.
Manager Response: Hi Mommy2768,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us and I am pleased to see that overall you did enjoy your stay.  We understood that a comfortable nights sleep is very important and chose our mattresses for that reason.  I am sorry that they were not firm enough for you but do hope you will reconsider staying with us in the future.   Thank you again and have a fantastic day!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: The room was okay, nothing special or amazing. It is updated and it has a modern appeal to it. I did feel the bathroom was a little dirty, but it could have just needed some touching-up i.e. there were stains on the walls and it just didn’t seem to be cleaned very well.   When we checked in the lady was helpful and friendly. There was breakfast in the morning but nothing amazing.   This was the first time in a VERY long time I have stayed at a hotel with exterior doors. I am use to my hotel door being inside a hall way and not open to the street. This made me feel a little unsafe and I did not feel like it was too secure. NOT being naive to think that interior hallways are any safer, I am well aware that bad things can happen anywhere.  Needless to say we survived.   Overall the
Manager Response: Hi MissMack13,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us here at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills and for providing us your feedback.  Great customer service and clean rooms to ensure a great stay are top priorities and as such we take your comments very seriously.  We will look into your comments to see where we can improve.  We are located in the quiet area of Anaheim Hills and like our guests to feel safe and secure. Thank you again and we do hope we can welcome you back soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We checked in on 2/14/15 and checked out 2/21/15 for our family trip. We drove all the way from Seattle so we were ver ytired. The staff was very quick to get us checked in and rested. The room was clean and comfortable. They offered a fridge and microwave in the room which became very handy since we had food to store and heat up during our stay which saved us money. The kids LOVED the breakfast that was provided. The food was well stocked and they had a wonderful selection of breads, muffins, yogurts, cereals and two different kinds of sausages. Overall our stay was fantastic! Thanks!
Manager Response: Hi Catherya C.,  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay with us!  I know a lot of planning went into this trip based on your TripAdvisor questions and it is great to hear that had a great stay.  Hopefully we will be able to welcome you back again soon!   Warm regards,   Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: I stayed during this past holiday season. everything was lovely and clean. all of the staff members were very kind and helpful and the room was great. The room was clean and the tv was excellent. I was there to be to share Christmas my my family.  ...Thank u so much!
Manager Response: Hi Elena J.   Thank you for spending the holidays with us!  It is great to see that you enjoyed your stay from the room, the tv, to the pool!  Hopefully this becomes a tradition and we can welcome you back during the holidays this year.   Thank you for sharing!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Great room at a great price if you are away from the freeway
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights, one of the lower-priced hotels in the Anaheim area at that time.  Our room was clean and well-maintained, with good storage and a great work area with plenty of plugs.  The bathroom has a ton of counter space - much nicer than we expected based on previous stays at Fairflelds.  Our room had a large refrigerator and microwave.  The bed was very comfortable.  Breakfast was very good with a variety of selections - eggs, waffles, cereal, yogurt etc. - much improved over what Fairfield used to offer for breakfast.  Our room was very quiet because it was away from the freeway - on the other side it is so noisy we would not have been able to stay here!  The rooms were very clean, but housekeeping was very late each day, closer to dinner than lunch - maybe
Manager Response: Hi Cliff J,   Thank you so much for your choosing to stay with us!  We appreciate your feedback and not only so we find it valuable but I am sure other travelers do as well!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed our rooms, breakfast, and value.  We hope that the next time you are in the area you will stay with us again.  Happy travels!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We stayed at the Fairfield Inn for almost a week. The room was comfortable and clean. Housekeeping did an amazing job cleaning around our girls' clutter. Maria, who set up breakfast in the mornings, was so friendly! She gave us great tips about attending the Rose Parade. She chatted with our girls every morning and helped them make waffles. Based on TripAdvisor reviews, we did ask for a room away from the freeway. Our room was quiet. Fairfield Inn, Anaheim Hills is a comfortable place to stay with friendly people. We enjoyed it very much!
Manager Response: Hi roadTripper Texas,   Thank you for your recent stay with us and we are so excited to see that you used the feedback from other travelers to enhance your stay with us.  Thank you for your kind words about Maria.  We are pleased she was able to provide some tips and are so pleased to have her on our team.  We will be sharing your kind words to her as well as our housekeeping team.   We appreciate you having you and hope to welcome you back again soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Hotel Desk Administrator, Maniel Elizondo, provided exempary service in advising me of hotel availability.  I needed accomodations for New Year's Eve at the last minute, and Maniel promised he would let me know as soon as any availability opened.  Rest assured, a room became available, and Maniel, as promised, gave me a call to alert me on a timely basis.  Having the room, in this location, contributed to a Great New Year's eve and stay.  Thank you, Maniel.  I hope to stay more often at your Fairfield in in Anaheim Hills.
Manager Response: Hi Michael P,   Thank you so much for taking the time to compliment one of our front desk agents Daniel.  We appreciate having him on the team and am so glad that you were able to stay with us New Years Eve and enjoyed your stay.  I have shared your kind words with all of our team.   Thank you so much and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager  nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We stayed here (12/3-6) on the first of our 3-leg California tour, and it was a great choice. The location is in a retail complex surrounded by stately palm trees. We were checked in by a beautiful blond front desk clerk, and she was every-bit what a hotel owner wants to greet travelers (it is California, right?), who had our reservation and directions ready to go.   The room was bright, clean, and very comfortable. The desk set-up worked great, and the rooms have lots of outlets. Lots of them. We never took advantage of the pool, but walked the grounds, and they appeared to be tip-top. Only glitch was the breakfast staff that was intent on crowding the food counter areas to keep stocking muffins and bagels when the orange and apple juice was empty. They just need some minor
Manager Response: Hi Sam280,   Thank you so much for your recent stay and for sharing your experience.  I am glad that we were a great way to start your California trip.  I will pass along your words in regards to breakfast to our breakfast staff.  We look forward to your next trip to the area.   Thank you for your feedback!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Fairfield Inns are a chain of cheap luxury motels.  It can truly be neither, so the reality is that it is a mixture of luxury and cheap.  This particular one was the best I have stayed at.  Very comfortable bed, good workspace, and included a really good breakfast buffet (never to be confused with a full breakfast buffet but very good for what it is).  Adjacent to a mall with a handful of eateries.  Free parking.
Manager Response: Hi motohigh,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers and for your recent stay with us.  Fairfield Inn's are a Marriott brand of moderately priced hotels.  We strive to make our guests feel welcome and also provide clean, comfortable accommodations.  It is truly an honor to be the best that you've stayed at and we hope that we have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!  Warm Regards,  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Great basic hotel, Small Room but Great Bathroom
Summary: I'm a big fan of the Marriott family of hotels so they're the first I look for when traveling. Most of the area around Disneyland was sold out or crazy expensive so I ventured out a little more than usual and found this Fairfield at a great price.   *If you're planning to use this hotel for a trip to Disneyland, keep in mind it's further than it sounds. It said only about 8 or 9 miles but the freeway to get there is very busy with tons of traffic.*  The check-in lady was really nice even though it was about 1:30am when we finally got in. She checked us in quickly, and explained the amenities of the hotel before providing us a map to get to the room.   The room itself was pretty good, it's a small room but the bathroom is pretty big and really nice. Bed was comfortable.   Parking
Manager Response: Hi Seaturtle_808,   Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing your experience.  We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and our friendly staff.  We hope that we will have the opportunity to have you as our guest the next time that you are in the Anaheim area.   Thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Nice remodel, comfy bed, small-ish 2 Queens room, road noise
Summary: We only stayed one night. The room was beautifully remodeled/redecorated; nice materials. The room with 2 Queen beds in it was a bit tight for 3 people; not much space to store luggage. The beds were relatively comfortable.  I did have a minor issue that I made the front desk aware of, and *without asking for anything* they adjusted my bill with a partial refund to ensure that I was satisfied with my room and experience.
Manager Response: Hi Kim S.,   Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing your feedback as well.  We look forward to this as it is a way to help us improve and make our guests happy.  I am pleased to see that we took the initiative and resolved the issue that you brought to our attention and hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our property soon. Summary Heading: friendly staff and good old fashioned Fairfield Inn structure
Summary: All Marriott properties are very similar in style and layout but what makes the difference from property to property is the hotel staff and I have never encountered a more genuinely friendly staff than I did at the Fairfield Inn in Anaheim Hills, Ca. It was very apparent that the hotel staff was very heartfelt in their "hello's" and their "how are you's" - it didn't seemed forced and it didn't seem as though it was just protocol. Every staff member was friendly! Everyone from the front desk clerks to the breakfast room attendants and up to and including the General Manager of the property. The property is nicely located - within walking distance of restaurants , grocery shopping and fitness centers. A bonus (if your like me and from the Midwest) is the view of the mountains
Manager Response: Hi Flyingtraveling24-7,   Thank you so much!  First, thank you for your recent stay and second for sharing what appears to be such an awesome experience with fellow travelers.  We definitely appreciate having you have shared your kind words with our GM Linda and will be sure to thank Jill and Kim as well.  We do hope that we will have the opportunity welcome you as our guests again soon.   Thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: The place was overall in good condition.  Room was clean, bathroom was large and clean, staff was helpful and friendly. Stay away from the freeway side rooms.  Breakfast can use help. Eggs were horrible. Noisy breakfast room.  Need better quality bread
Manager Response: Hi M B,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  I will be sure to share your feedback in regards to breakfast to the appropriate departments.  I am happy that you found your room clean and comfortable and I hope that we will be able to welcome you back in the near future.   Thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We stayed on Oct 18, have stayed in the past before, felt confident getting a good night rest. In our experiences we always prior request during making advance reservations for upper floor for less noises. When arriving we were placed on second floor, not sure if our reservation was overlooked. We weren't to early for check in either. I did ask the desk clerk, he told us that originally we were placed on the first floor untill he saw request moved us to the second floor. He also mentioned that only 4th floor near the freeway had a room vacant it was another choice at the time. The 3rd floor facing the pool were taken or not cleaned yet. Well we kept our second floor unfortunately the third floor had several youth running around. We lacked sleep for our needed rested stay =(  It
Manager Response: Hi Hapoy,   First, thank you for choosing to spend your birthday with us.  I do apologize that we weren't able to fulfill your request of a higher room.  We do try our best to accommodate each guest request but sometimes that isn't always possible.  I know how important birthdays are as well as a good nights rest.  I do hope that you will give us another chance to not just meet your expectations but to also surpass them.  The next time you are in the area please contact me directly and I would be more than happy to assist with your reservation.   Thank you again,   Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Stayed 4 nights here recently.  Liked that I was in a room not next to the highway - in fact, it ended up being a handicap-accessible room above the lobby.  The room itself was spacious, though could have been cleaned better (it wasn't vacuumed the entire time I was there - or possibly before - as there was a plastic garment tag on the floor that stayed the duration of my time there...counter/table tops weren't wiped down - water marks from drinks were left for days...and the vent in the bathroom - that REALLY needs to be cleaned!    However, I very much enjoyed the location - both that it was at the end of a road (so not a lot of traffic) and everything around it - close to parks, shopping, and walkable distance to many great restaurants.  I also really liked their pool area:
Manager Response: Hi welovenokids,   Thank you so much for your recent and for sharing all of those details with us.  I have passed along your words to the appropriate team members.  I am pleased to see that overall you enjoyed your stay and we will definitely take words as an opportunity to improve and we look forward to your next stay.   Thank you again ,   Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Picked this location due to good reviews on TA. Nice location near many restaurants. Really liked Don Jose's across the street. Very comfortable beds and pillows. Excellent air conditioning. Nice breakfast with very nice staff. Very good free wifi. Small negatives. The tub did not drain. We did not report it. We are not fans of apartment style hotels. Just a safety factor. You can't tell from the pics it is this style hotel. We would stay again. Much cheaper than hotels next to Disney. Be aware of morning traffic. It is a nightmare! Don't know how these people can live here like this.
Manager Response: Hi Dbax,   Thank you so much for your recent stay.  It is so awesome how you used TripAdvisor to make your decision and then shared your own experience with other travelers.  We definitely appreciate it.  We are so pleased that were so many things you liked about our hotel including our breakfast, beds, air conditioning and our proximity to various restaurants.  We look forward to your next stay!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Great hotel…Awesome customer service!  The front desk crew is the best! Thanks to Ernie for providing excellent service. We had a problem with our car and he made sure we were up and running quickly.   Thank you for the wonderful service!
Manager Response: Hi 245Audrey,   I am so pleased to see we were able to assist with your car issue and that you enjoyed our staff especially our new team member and manager Ernie.  That is an awesome display of customer service.  We definitely appreciate your feedback and for selecting us at the hotel to stay in and we hope to welcome you again soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Stayed here for a few days while my husband and I house hunted ! Great location- kind of off from the main road but close to a few restaurants! Super clean rooms and they were a good size too ;)! Bed was super comfy after staying in a vacation rental the week before. AC unit worked well and our room was quiet! No complaints.... For the people that are I don't know how they have anything to say but that's just me!;) breakfast was decent and free as well!
Manager Response: Dear T G,   First, I hope the house hunting went well!  Second, thank you for choosing us while you house hunted.  I am so happy to see that y'all enjoyed your stay with us from the location, the beds, and the room cleanliness.  We hope that we will have the opportunity to have you as our guests again.  Thank you for sharing your experience and happy hunting!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Stayed there for a soccer event with several families.  I'll keep this short.  Location good.  Staff great.  Breakfast great.  Rates fantastic.  Room smell poor.  Ice machines not working.  Unsavory guests not good however maybe just a unique event.  All in all, not a good representation for a Fairfield Inn.  Too many nice clean hotels all over to warrant this choice if you can find a few dollars more per night.  At $99, it's a good place to sleep and have breakfast.
Manager Response: Hi Europe-07-09-11,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us and for sharing your feedback.  We do appreciate comments as it is a great chance for us to not only improve but show what we are doing right.  I am pleased that although you did encounter a few problems that you did enjoy our location, staff and breakfast.  We have replaced one of the ice machines and I would definitely love to investigate your room further so that we can alleviate this problem.  I do apologize for the inconvenience but hope the next time there is a tournament in the area you will consider giving us another chance to wow you.   Once again thank you and we appreciate having you as our guests!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We selected the Fairfield Inn in Anaheim Hills CA after our regular hotel was already booked. We were not expecting much but were more than presently surprised.  The front desk was very friedly and helpful. i am handicapped so they immediately assigned us a ground floor room. The room was clean and well furnished the beds were very comfortable The continental breakfast included: Juices, milk coffee, fruiut, fruii flavored yogurt, eggs sausage, pancakes, waffles, bagels and cereal. The breakfast room attendant, Maria was extremely pleasant and helpful she was a very positive asset to the hotel
Manager Response: Hi Capt_Tom,   I am so pleased to see that we exceeded your expectations through our friendly and helpful staff as well as our breakfast and accessibility.  Thank you so much for selecting us and hopefully we can become your new go-to hotel. Thank you for your feedback it is appreciated!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: This hotel was an older hotel but very very well kept.  The area was nice, around a big shopping area and lots of restaurants.  The rooms were great very big and the shower was great, it was a walk in tile shower.  The A/C was not so good, it was just okay.  Breakfast was good.
Manager Response: Hi Theresa F.,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience with your recent stay with us as well as other Trip Advisor travelers!  I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed our rooms, our breakfast as well as our location.  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and we look forward to having you with us again!  Thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Very nice Hotel. Comfortable beds. Great air conditioner. Plentry of room for 2 people located right off the 91 Freeway and Imperial Hwy. Very nice pool with plenty of lounge chairs. Great breakfast buffet.  The only negative was no vent in the bathroom resulting in fogged up mirror.
Manager Response: Hi RonLKelley,   Thank you so much for choosing the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills for your recent stay.  It is always great to see that we have made a guest happy during their stay.  I am pleased that you enjoyed our beds, breakfast and pool area.  We look forward to having you as our guest again soon and if you ever need anything please do not hesitate to contact me.   Thnak you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: I stayed here while on a trip to visit my cousin in Anaheim, and this hotel, even though it feels like it's in the middle of nowhere, is a really comfortable stay. The bed was so comfortable, the bathroom was well designed, the air conditioning saved me from the LA heat, and the free wifi saved me from being bored and lost during the evening. There are a lot of parking spaces available, so if you're taking a car (which I highly recommend, since you'll need one to get to anywhere), you don't have to worry about parking. The staff there are really helpful and the breakfast was pretty good. Overall, I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel because the rooms themselves are really nice.
Manager Response: Hi Ronnie T,   I am so pleased to see that your enjoyed your stay with us while you visited your cousin in the area.  I see that you enjoyed our rooms, our breakfast, and our friendly helpful staff.  Thank you for selecting us and we hope to have you as our guests on your next stay here!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean, I love the bathtub. The breakfast was good! The rooms where small. The only thing I did not like about the hotel was laundry room it had be close by 10pm, when you have a softball games going on,  you came back late sometimes you have to  wash the uniforms late.
Manager Response: Hi Maggie B,   Thank you so much for your recent stay here at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills.  We definitely appreciate having you with us and for sharing your experience. I am so pleased to see that you found us clean and comfortable and enjoyed our bathtubs.  We did select the laundry hours with the comfort of all of our guests in mind but it is also opened early for early risers as well.  We do hope that the next time you have a tournament in the area that you will stay with us again.   Thank you!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Stayed here 3 nights to go to Disney. It is only 11 miles away but with traffic it can take 20-30 min to get there. Rooms were nice, typical of what you would expect from a Marriott Fairfield property. Breakfast was ok and standard choices, perfect for us that want to eat and get going.  There is a Starbucks in the plaza next door if you need real coffee. The property is also close to some restarurants. It was perfect for our family.
Manager Response: Hi jscibetta,   First, I would like to thank you for choosing our hotel to have your family stay on your recent Disney vacation.  We definitely appreciate having you as our guests.  Second, thank you for sharing your feedback not only with us but to fellow TripAdvisor users as well.  I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed the restaurants within walking distance including Starbucks, your room and our breakfast.  I hope the next time you and your family take a trip to Disneyland that we will have the honor of having you as our guests again.  Thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: The hotel was clean and comfortable. The staff were always helpful and courteous. We stayed there with our daughters softball team and needed breakfast to open a little early so the girls could make there games each morning. Maria opened the doors to breakfast 10 min. early for us 2 days and once I figured out to request early breakfast at the front desk they opened 30 min early. Thank you Maria!
Manager Response: Hi Edwin B.,   Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us while your daughter competed in the softball tournament.   I am so pleased that you found our front desk courteous and helpful and were able to enjoy breakfast each morning of your stay.  It is the most important meal of the day and I am so glad we met your needs by opening early.  We hope to have you all stay with us again the next time you're in the area.   Thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Pleasant & A Nice Place To Stay
Summary: Been here first week of my two week stay. Love the accommodations.  Close to freeway for access anywhere.  Clean and appealing property.  Breakfast buffet included. Very Nice rooms that are quiet, spacious and with beds that are extremely comfortable. Front Desk and maintenance personnel friendly and exceptionally helpful. Breakfast has a wide assortment of hot and cold food, fruits and beverages.
Manager Response: Hi GumShoeSanDiego,   Welcome to your home away from home for the next two weeks.  I am so pleased to see that you are enjoying your stay with us from our rooms, location and our breakfast as well as our exceptional staff.  Please continue to enjoy your stay and do not hesitate to let us know if you need anything.   Enjoy your stay and thank you so much for your feedback!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: I was surprised when I walked into the hotel room. Didn't expect such a nice room. Fun stay when you need to just get away to be alone with your mate. Continental breakfast had a lot of selections. The staff was very pleasant! I would stay there again!
Manager Response: Hi Aprilkat04,   Thank you for selecting us for your getaway with your mate!  I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed our rooms, our breakfast and our staff!  We look forward to having you as our guest again the next time you need to relax.   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager  Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We needed a hotel as close to Disneyland as possible, without paying Disney prices.  We immediately went on Tripadvisor and started to look around, eventually deciding between this Fairfield Inn and a similar-priced hotel nearby.  The Fairfield Inn had slightly better reviews so we went with it, and very glad we did.  It is exactly what you'd expect from a Fairfield Inn which was perfect since it met our expectations and we were happy.  We stayed 2 nights, and checked in pretty late on a Friday.  We parked by the front entrance and I quickly noticed that the night security is very available and always walking around that area- considering the hotel is actually around the back road of a shopping plaza, and every room has an external door, this was reassuring.  There were also a
Manager Response: Hi Marlsak,   Thank you so much for using TripAdvisor and for selecting our hotel.  I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to share your experience with future travelers.  The nifty thing about our rooms is that there is a piece of furniture that is a built in luggage rack.  It is that space right next to the armoire where the ottoman is stored underneath.  I am sorry that wasn't explained to you and that we did not have a folding one available.  Again, thank you so much for staying with us on your Disneyland trip and we look forward to having you with us again soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: I don't have a single complaint. We just needed a simple, reasonably priced hotel to go to Disneyland, and this place was exactly that. It is about 15 minutes drive from Disney but there was almost no traffic on a Saturday morning. They even sell park tickets at the front desk. The hotel was clean, the a/c worked well and the staff was friendly. The breakfast was on par for what they offer, it's not gourmet, but that shouldn't be your expectation. It was good enough and convenient. If you are looking for a lot of bells and whistles, this isn't the right place, but overall, a very comfortable stay for 2 nights at a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Hi Benny3345,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us and for sharing your experience with fellow TripAdvisor users!  I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us from our pricing, our breakfast and our location.  We look forward to having you stay with us again on your next visit to the park.   Have a great day and thank you again!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: We hadn't stayed here since 2006. We've been staying at Embassy Suites with our children. This was good choice for just hubby and me. It was family visit and relax at hotel. This place has been decorated very modern and clean. Friendly staff and breakfast had great selections. I very much will be reserving this hotel for future stays.
Manager Response: Hi Alicia R,   Thank you so much for selecting our hotel for your recent visit with your god children.  I am so pleased to see that you found us fresh and modern and that we were able to meet your needs.  Next time have the kids visit you here and enjoy our pool area perfect for family time.  We look forward to having you again soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Very pleasant stay. Comfy rooms and reasonably priced. Not much to do around the hotel, but if have a specific reason to be in the area, we were attending a wedding at the Nixon Library nearby, so this location was perfect.
Manager Response: Hi Donna,  I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay while attending the wedding at the gorgeous Nixon Library.  Next time you are in the area you can catch a game at Angel Stadium, a concert at the Honda Center or even visit Disneyland! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and for staying with us and we hope to see you soon!  Have a great day! Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: Check in was easy and fast.  The lady at the front desk was very nice and showed us exactly how to get to our room and gave us a map of the place and local restaurants.  There was even free cookies, perfect for the kids after a long ride in the car.  The room was nice. Loved the beds, nice bathroom, nice overall.  Only negative thing was that breakfast ended at 9 am and the front desk didn't tell us that.  We went down at 9:05 am and the breakfast was already over.  :(  Oh well now we know for next time and still over all a good experience.
Manager Response: Hi Jadensmommy2011,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us.  I am so glad you enjoyed the cookies we have available in the afternoon as well as your rooms.  I am sorry you did not get a chance to enjoy our waffles and sausage for breakfast but do you hope you will on your next visit.   Thank you for sharing your experience and hope to see you soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: I have stayed at this property for over 100 nights. They have remodeled all the rooms with updated furniture and decorations and also remodeled the bathrooms. The best rate is their weekly rate for 7 nights. It is within 30 minutes of a lot of venues including Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. The staff are great. It is close to grocery stores and shopping centers to get supplies.
Manager Response: Hi ejlwireless,   Thank you so much for your continued loyalty and staying with us.  We appreciate having you as our guests.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with other travelers.  If you need anything please do not hesitate to let us know.   Thank you again and see you soon!  Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: The hotel was right next to a freeway but we couldn't really hear the vehicles. It was nicely located - walking distance to grocery stores, restaurants and coffee shops. Traffic in the area is light and it was easy to get in and out of the area. The trip was a business one for my husband and a leisure one for me, and we weren't really there for Disneyland, but even if we were, it wasn't that far of a drive. There really isn't a lot of public transport in the area so you actually do need a car if you stay here though.   The bathroom was nice and had a lot of counter space. The room was big and the tv was nice and had lots of HD cable channels, including HBO. I had the pool to myself pretty much the entire time I was there. They had free hot breakfast daily which includes
Manager Response: Hi Buttercup1211,   I am so glad we had the opportunity to have you as our guests and that you enjoyed your stay.  Our location is indeed convenient to variety of stores and restaurants and I am glad to see you enjoyed our breakfast as well.  I am curious as to what room number you had so that I can investigate further but I am so pleased to see that the staff was able to assist in making your stay more comfortable.   We look forward to having you as our guest again soon.   Thank you,   Nicole Reid Sales Manager  Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: I needed to stay in the Anaheim area, but didn't want to be at Disney. This was a great location and had several dining options nearby. The rooms looked recently renovated and very clean! Breakfast area was well stocked and clean. The only down side was the exterior corridors, but I didn't hear any street traffic. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Uachops,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us and for sharing your experience with fellow travelers on TripAdvisor.  I am so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We are a great location if you want to be near Disneyland but in a quiet area without all of the traffic and with a variety of restaurants within walking distance.  We can't wait to have you as our guests again!  Thank you,  Nicole Reid Sales Manager Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary Heading: Close enough to Disney to work
Summary: We spent 3 nights here recently on a vacation to go to Disneyland among other sites.  The hotel was about a 20-25 minute drive to Disney (a little farther than we had expected, but not a big deal at all).  It was a nice area with several nice restaurants in walking distance and in a fairly quiet area.  Our room was nice, with  comfortable bed and a fridge and coffee maker.  The free breakfast was terrific with all the trimmings.  The staff was very helpful and friendly.  They were very attentive to our requests. My only slight complaint was the lack of glass drinking cups in the room.  Plastic just isn't always the best.
Manager Response: Hi TravelerMontana,   Thank you so much for choosing the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills to stay for your family trip to Disneyland.  Also, thank you for sharing your experience as well as tips with future travelers as I am sure others will find them helpful.  I am so glad you enjoyed our location as well as our breakfast and we hope to have the pleasure of having you stay with us again soon.   Nicole Reid Nicole.reid@marriott.com

Summary: This property is a short drive to Disneyland and close to the highway. Staff very nice and hotel very nice. Updated hotel, clean with a whirlpool tub. Next to a grocery store and nice restaurants as well as a Starbucks and Chase bank. Their breakfast selection was very good fresh fruit, waffles, hot ready made oat meal. The only down side was the nights that we stayed there were a group of kids and were up all night and  rowdy. The hotel apologize about it and understandable you can not control your guest. But other than that very nice time and would do again.
Manager Response: Hello YgMickey,   Thank you so much for providing your feedback on your recent stay.  We definitely appreciate having you stay with us and am so glad that you enjoyed our location as well as our breakfast.  I do apologize for the noise that our other guests created.  We did our best to control it as the comfort of all of our guests is a priority.  I am thankful that you will consider staying with us again and we can not wait to have you as our guests.   Thank you and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: I called the staff and asked them if they offered shuttle service from the Metrolink Station. Then they said, "There is no Metrolink Station around here," which is odd because there has been an Anaheim Hills Metrolink station for most of the last decade. Plus, it shows up on the Same Google Maps page just a couple miles away. Plus I've been taking that train to there and from there for the last six years. Then, at last they admitted that such a station might exist, but that it was too far away for the shuttle, making me wonder what on earth they'd do if it were an airport hotel, since, if you have a shuttle, it is odd that you don't service the nearest train station, when that station is the nearest mass-transit station and is actually called Anaheim Canyon, to signify the very
Manager Response: Hello Mel:  I am so sorry for the inconvenience that occurred during your recent inquiry.  It appears that there was a miscommunication that occurred.  If we have a driver available we are able to pick-up form the Metrolink station in  Anaheim Hills as it is within the radius that our shuttle travels.  There are occasions where the Anaheim Hills location is confused with the Anaheim station.  I do apologize for the misunderstanding as this occurrence is atypical of an experience here.  As you can see by the many positive reviews guests find our staff friendly and efficient.  I hope that you will be able to give us another chance so that we can really show you what we are all about the renovated rooms that many guests have enjoyed.   Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Love staying here! they are always very nice and the beds are great! I like everything about this place including the breakfast. The front desk is always helpful and I like the fact it a refrigerator and Microwave in the room. Thanks for making this my home away from home!
Manager Response: Hi Tim,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us as well as useful tips to fellow travelers.  We appreciate having you as our guests and are thankful that you enjoy our breakfast, staff, location and our rooms!  We can't wait to have you again soon and thank you again!

Summary Heading: Great Property regardless of it being a bit out there...
Summary: My family and I recently stayed at the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills for a quick spring break trip. It was a short getaway. We found the property on some search engine. We wanted a hotel near Disney but wanted to save money by staying a little farther off property. Yes...this is about a 15-20 minutes drive to the park but it is in a beautiful area, the opposite direction of downtown. That means less  traffic. But remember...you are in LA...so there is always traffic. Our check in was perfect. The front Desk was very personable and friendly. He suggested two local grocery stores within a 2-3 minute drive. He spoke with my son about Disney Pin Trading. He went out of his way to make us feel welcome!  Our room was perfect and we loved the large Jacuzzi tub, Although we quickly
Manager Response: Hi Michael,   You have no idea how happy and thankful I am to read this review.  First, thank you for not only staying with us but for sharing your experience with other travelers.  I will go around to all of the departments and thank each individual that helped to make your stay special.  We do receive our share of groups but do our very best to ensure that all guests have an enjoyable stay.  I see that there was a problem with the whirlpool tub and we were able to not only fix but follow-up.  I do hope that we will have you as our guests again soon when you and your son do more pin-trading at Disneyland.   Thank you again and have a great day!

Summary Heading: The rooms on the first floor could be noisy in the morning
Summary: This is the first time I stayed in a Fairfield Inn, the layout is like a motel, with the room entrance facing the parking spots (I was given a first floor room). Our room number is 110, it is close to the breakfast room/area, so it could be quite noisy in the morning, because people are getting up earlier to go to Disneyland.   The room is of contemporary style, with a king bed, it is not as big/wide as other Marriott brands I have stayed, but very clean; the bathroom has lots of counter space, which is the reason I gave the extra star.
Manager Response: Hi Jabba85286,   First let me welcome you to the Fairfield Inn and Suites Brand.  We appreciate having you as our guest and for sharing your experience with future travelers.  We did complete our renovation last year so I am glad that you enjoyed our new, more stylish rooms.  We pride ourselves on providing our guest a clean and comfortable needs and am so glad that you were able to enjoy our rooms especially our large bathrooms.  I do hope that we will have the opportunity to have you as our guest again not only here but at the other 700 Fairfield Inn & Suites across the country!  We all have a little something different to offer.   Thank you again!

Summary: My daughter, my mother and I stayed at this hotel on a recent trip to California.  I'm so happy that we chose this location.  It was close to Disneyland without being 'too' close.  Also, we were able to visit San Diego will relative ease from this hotel.  The staff was lovely, friendly and accomodating.  The property is beautifully maintained and in a safe area.  The breakfast was amazing - cereals, waffles and yogurts, fruit, muffins and juice - the list goes on.  Coffee and tea are available all day in the lobby.  Our room had a microwave and a refrigerator perfect for snacks and reheating dinner leftovers.
Manager Response: Hi Tfun247,   I am so pleased that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for choosing us!  It is so awesome to see that not only did you like our location, but also our staff, our breakfast as well as our rooms with the microwaves and refrigerators.   We appreciate having you as our guest and look forward to your next visit.   Thank you!

Summary: Had the pleasure of staying at this hotel while visiting my son and his wife in Anaheim.  Room rates were very competitive, staff was great, accommodations were clean and comfortable and location was excellent.  Hotel offers what they call a Continental breakfast, but I would call it a full breakfast buffet featuring eggs, sausage, waffles etc.  There is also a pool and hot tub area that is very relaxing.  In addition, the hotel is adjacent to a shopping center with several nice eateries.  Will be back.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Killingly,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us and for sharing your experience.  I am so pleased to see that you found our staff to be excellent and our breakfast exceeded your expectations!  Fairfield Inn and Suites as a brand has changed the breakfast so you will be able to enjoy this type of breakfast at any Fairfield Inn and Suites that you stay.  We can not wait to have you as our guest again!

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel during our latest Disneyland trip. Besides at peak rush hour times the traffic was not too bad getting to and from the park. Our room comfortably fit four people, one of them being a toddler who slept in a portable crib. All the staff were very courteous anytime that we had to call for extra towels, to bring the crib, and to come again with a new crib when the first one we received didn't lock on all four sides (it happens). I was really impressed with the selection of breakfast items at the free buffet. What I appreciated most about the stay is how attentive the workers were to my son when he burned his hand on the waffle maker (He was 7 at the time and it was completely his fault). While I was busy admonishing him for his carelessness, a staff
Manager Response: Hello Monchichi80,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with myself as well as other travelers.  I am so pleased to see that you and your family enjoyed your trip to Disneyland and that the staff here at the hotel were courteous and attentive to your needs especially to your son.  We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you visit the park.  Thank you again!

Summary Heading: If only the room didn't have that smell.....
Summary: I believe this property was probably "something else" before it was a Fairfield Inn. Not quite up to Marriott standards...our room (303) had a terrible musty odor when we checked in and off and on during the next 4 days it got strong.....but sometimes not so bad. The room had a small fridge and microwave and flat screen. The room was quiet and clean...the breakfast spread was the usual and the breakfast area kept clean and you weren't chased out right at closing time. Maria the breakfast attendant did a great job. Pool is small but very clean...enough chaise loungers and nice fitness area with windows and tv's on every machine. Front desk (especially Mike) was very friendly and helpful. Lots of restaurants nearby...and laundry on premises. Just seemed like an older property and
Manager Response: Hi Elie,   Thank you so much for your recent stay.  We are proud to be a part of the Marriott brand and work very hard to maintain our standards.  Maria and Mike are great and I am pleased you found them to be helpful and friendly as I do!   I am so sorry that there was a smell in your room but do appreciate you providing the room number so that we can further investigate.  We do hope that we will have an opportunity in the future to really show you what the Fairfield Inn Anaheim Hills is all about!

Summary: I booked this hotel because 1. Part of Marriott 2. Free breakfast 3. FREE parking. These things were especially helpful in my decision to stay here in saving money but not being in a bad area. The drive to Disney was about 15 minutes so not bad at all. The staff was very friendly. The rooms are old but remodeled so are nice. They are smaller but didn't need a lot of space for sleeping. Could use improvement on housekeeping services. Bathroom floor upon check in had a lot of hair. I had to call and ask the next day it be cleaned up. It wasn't cleaned until the 3rd day. Other than that the stay was great. Location is near restaurants which is also a plus.
Manager Response: Hi Nisla,  First thank you so much for being a Marriott loyal guest.  I am so thrilled that overall you enjoyed your stay such as our breakfast, proximity to the park and our friendly staff.  I will look into the issue with the bathroom as cleanliness is a top priority of ours and we definitely want our guests to be comfortable.  Thank you for sharing your feedback and I do hope that next time you are in the Anaheim area we have an opportunity to show you how truly awesome we are!

Summary: The Gps could not locate the hotel correctly. I don't know if it was only with us ? Check In was prompt . We had a room which was like very far from the lobby/breakfast area. But rooms were spacious and modern. The next day we realized that the keys were not locking properly or that the door was not getting closed.called the front desk and the issue was resolved quickly.  The breakfast area was large and spread out so it doesn't feel crowded or rushed.  The front desk was also helpful in suggesting restaurants along with map/directions
Manager Response: Dear LimReviewer,  We are a bit tucked away I am glad you were able to locate us and had a great stay!  We do like to differentiate ourselves with a completely separate breakfast room so that guests are comfortable.  I am so pleased that we responded to the issue of the key promptly and effectively and that our front desk was helpful.  Thank you so much for your feedback and your stay and we look forward to having you again soon!

Summary: This is an older but very nice hotel located on Highway 91 in Anaheim Hills.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast buffet was excellent and included in the room rate.  The hotel is located near many restaurants, a pharmacy and a grocery store.
Manager Response: Dear Spursone,   I am so glad that you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  We pride ourselves on friendly guest service and are super proud of breakfast which both met your needs.  We hope to have you as our guests again soon!

Summary: My family and I stayed for 2 nights in January 2014. The price wasn't bad and the location was good for us. The room, while remodeled, still seemed old. It is a motel and felt like it. The only real complaints we had were that the microwave barely worked (ex. 15 minutes to cook a Hot Pocket) and in the middle of the night there was a random screeching from the bathroom which woke us all up (sounded like a broken exhaust fan randomly turning on). I did notify the front desk at check out and they did seem concerned and offered me extra Marriot points for the inconvenience. The breakfast was pretty good and the staff in there were very friendly in the mornings. I'm not sure I would stay again, but it could have been worse.
Manager Response: Hello 920LindaJ,   Thank you so much for your recent stay at our hotel.  I am sorry that the microwave was not functioning properly but we appreciate you bringing it to our attention so that we can fix it.  I am pleased to see that the staff were able to resolve your issues.  Making sure each guest has a wonderful stay is our priority and hopefully you will us another chance to wow you.  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: We had reserved two rooms and were given rooms poolside on the 3rd floor.  The rooms were spacious and very clean and in good repair.  The mini fridge and microwave was an added bonus!  The breakfast was varied and had many options.  The price was right! Free!  The hotel is is within walking distance to many shops and places to eat.  We found everything in good repair on the property and enjoyed the heated pool and hot tub after a long drive.  We will stay at this property again when in the area later this year!
Manager Response: Hi Rebelyell,   Thank you for your recent stay with us!  It is pleasing to see that you had an enjoyable stay with our rooms, breakfast pool and surrounding area.  We look forward to having you stay with us again on your next visit to the area.  Thank you for sharing your experience not just with us but with other travelers as well!

Summary Heading: My all time fav Fairfield Inn in So. Cal. !!
Summary: This is my favorite Fairfield ever. Fantastic renovation and design in the room.  Outlets a plenty in reachable places.  The bathroom has a counter that is perfect to pull the rolling stool  over from the main room and get ready.  Most comfortable beds bar none,  I dare say, perhaps even better than a Doubletree dream-sleeper! Like a immediate chill pill when you lay down.   Some of the rooms have a Whirlpool tub, breakfast is above average from most places that offer comp'ed  morning fare.  This review should have been done months ago.... I have stayed here 5 times or more.  I always have been very happy and comfortable here.  The staff is attentive and friendly. And can't give a negative comment to anything. My review would be as sparkling for any of my previous stays.  I used
Manager Response: Hi Tracy,   Thank you so much for your stay, your feedback and your words.   We are always striving to make all of our guests stays an excellent one.  I am glad that you enjoyed your room, the beds and the breakfast on all of your stays with us and we look forward to having you again!

Summary: We stayed one night while visiting family in the area.  The room was nice with nice bathroom. We appreciated the free wifi and breakfast.  Breakfast room was large and comfortable with better than average selections.  Room was clean and quiet, on the side away from the freeway.  Very good value for the price.
Manager Response: Hi Roz,   It is refreshing to hear that we were able to make your one night stay a good night stay.  I am pleased that you enjoyed the selections that we offer for breakfast as well as our wifi.  Please come visit us again soon!

Summary: I have family in the area, and myself and other family members have stayed here multiple time.  They have great customer service from the minute you walk in the door, till the time you check out.  Whether it is the middle of the day, for early check in to the middle of the night for a late check in, they are happy to see you, and to get you situated in your room.  The rooms are well appointed and very comfortable; including a nice desk area to get some work done if needed.  They have a pretty well appointed breakfast in the morning, including waffles, eggs, and sausage or bacon.  The area is nice with many restaurants nearby.  One last things that amazed me, a week after I left a family member in the area had there water heater die with no hot water.  At 4am the hotel allowed
Manager Response: Hi R G,   I am so glad that you've always enjoyed your stays with us while visiting family and that your family also enjoys staying with us.  We try our best to be accommodating and helpful and understand that when you come to a hotel you want to relax.  It is awesome that we've been able to accommodate early check-ins as well as late arrivals and believe me we are happy to see our guests.  Thank you for not only choosing to stay with us but also sharing your experience with myself as well as other travelers.   We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed in October, and it was a good stay at the Fairfield. We liked the breakfast and the attendants. They were very helpful and seemed to care about every guest. Our room was nice and for the most part clean. The bed was so comfortable we appreciated that a lot. We enjoyed the location it was in and there were restaurants and stores near by to shop at. It was about 10 mins away from Disneyland however it was worth it only because the other hotels seemed to be a lot more crowded and noise. The location seemed to block all that. Overall I would stay again.
Manager Response: Hi Cheyenne,   I am so pleased that you enjoyed our location just minutes from the main area of Disneyland.  We are in a quieter location but with many dining areas nearby.  All of us here do appreciate you staying with us and it is definitely reflected in our breakfast with our staff.  We all want to make sure that all of our guests have an enjoyable stay from the moment they wake up until they go to sleep and all the time you spend with us in between.  We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We had a big wedding set up and the hotel offered special prices for the wedding guests.  The room was really comfortable with all the trimmings. The small breakfast buffet was decent and served a good purpose.  The hotel was near many restaurants and shopping.  I would stay there again!
Manager Response: Hi Pbhomey,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and congratulations on the new marriage.  We definitely appreciated having your guests stay with us and am so pleased that everyone enjoyed their stay as well as our breakfast.   Thank you for sharing your experience and we hope to have you again soon!

Summary: this hotel/motel looks a lot nicer online than it does in person. They did a good job renovating the rooms but they stink.. our room smelled it hadn't ever been aired out you could still smell the decades old cigarette smoke in it. we were in room 237 and the laundry room had to of been near by.. we couldn't hear it but every once in awhile our room started shaking.. the first time we thought it was one of those elusive California earthquakes. it was like an old school motel where you put a quarter in the bed and it shakes. our room door didn't shut properly, when we called the front desk they didn't seem at all surprised it sounded like they deal with that on the regular. Having a door that didn't properly shut didn't make us feel overly safe considering it's a walk up motel
